artist: Ralph Lysell; Hugo Blomberg; Telefonaktiebolaget LM Ericsson, Stockholm, Sweden
creditline: Lent by Richard and Diana Rose
description: aqua blue; one-piece unit; bulbous base with ear piece extending up from it; mouth piece in base; thin, black rubber band around bottom of base; rotary-dial on underside of base; red-circular hang-up switch in center of dial
title: "Ericofon" rotary-dial telephone
